channel.title: C on drasyl is a high-performance framework for rapid development of distributed applications
channel.description: Recent content in C on drasyl is a high-performance framework for rapid development of distributed applications

item.title: DrasylNode as Shared Library
item.description: We are excited to announce our blazing fast and native version of DrasylNode as a shared C library. This was achieved by translating Java code with the required JDK runtime elements into native code using the GraalVM.
